title: Ultra Rare Rik Mayall Collection by Starbug81
description:
HIGHLIGHTS INCLUDE:
- Rik's Original 1981 "People's Poet" Stand Up Routines
- The Young Ones Live Aid Comic Relief Gig From 1986
- Cliff Richard & The Young Ones' Living Doll Video Clip
- Rare Kevin Turvey Ramblings
- Rik's Ultra Rare "Mitch The Feminist"
- Original Dangerous Brothers Roughhousing
- Bad News' Bohemian Rhapsody & Bonuses
- Rik's Bits From Ben Elton's Happy Families
- Rik & Ade's Tribute To Peter Cook
- Rik Discussing Harry Potter, John Cleese & His Quad Bike Accident
- The Making Of Guest House Paradiso AND The PC Game (It's minutes of fun :p)
PLUS dozens of rare interviews... and a couple of teddy bears getting nasty on Rik's bed! (That scene was often omitted on Australian TV/Video. I found an uncensored version... but they've omitted Neil singing "Hello Darkness My Old Friend"! RUDDY ROYALTIES! :s

I HAVE ALSO UPLOADED;
- KEVIN TURVEY INVESTIGATESÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
- KEVIN TURVEY: THE MAN BEHIND THE GREEN DOOR
- THE DANGEROUS BROTHERS PRESENT WORLD OF DANGER
- BEN ELTON'S HAPPY FAMILIES
- MAN DOWN SERIES 1

PLEASE NOTE: Rik's only in the 3rd episode of HAPPY FAMILIES but it's a must see for any fan of Benetton and it features the who's who of THE YOUNG ONES crowd.

FUN FACT: Ben Elton only ever intended on doing one series of HAPPY FAMILIES and Producer Paul Jackson was well aware... but he kept a slot in BBC's schedule so he could take a risk on a show that might be shit. That slot was filled by RED DWARF! :p

Simply click on my username and probe my offerings :)
